name:
Pokémon™ Mystery Dungeon:
Gates to Infinity
description:
The Pokémon Mystery Dungeon
series has come to Nintendo 3DS!
Players take on the role of a
Pokémon and explore a world packed
with excitement, adventure and
dungeons with ever-changing layouts!
Battle other Pokémon and recruit
them to your team, help turn Pokémon
Paradise into a thriving city and use
the outer cameras of your
Nintendo 3DS to discover
Magnagates leading to new dungeons!
